CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_history JSON,
    visit_count INT,
    last_login TIMESTAMP,
    subscription_status BOOLEAN
);
